definition: Classic of Mountain and Sea, probably compiled c. 500 BC-200 BC, contains wide range of geography, mythology, witchcraft, popular customs etc
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing

sentences.english: Liu Xin revised The Classic of Mountains and Rivers, which contributed to the wide spreading in Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 劉歆的校訂對於擴大《山海經》在兩漢傳播亦有貢獻。

sentences.english: Many ancient fables and tales are recorded in Shanhai Jing.
sentences.chinese: 山海經》中記載了很多遠古的神話傳說。

sentences.english: The record about Pictures of Classic of Mountains and Seas is after Dongjing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 關於《山海經》圖的記錄均是東晉以後的記載。

sentences.english: It also studies the spread and variation of these illustrations in China and the neighboring country Japan.
sentences.chinese: 並探討山海經圖在國內與近鄰日本國的流傳與變異。

sentences.english: In the ancient geography book Shanhai Jing (The Book of Mountains and Seas), there is an account of "Long-Leg Kingdom".
sentences.chinese: 古文獻《山海經》中有關於“長股國”的記述。

sentences.english: We have heard his gossips many times.
sentences.chinese: 山海經我們已經聽過很多遍了。

sentences.english: Classic of Mountains and Rivers is an ancient writing coming down for more than two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 《山海經》是一部流傳了兩千餘年的上古時期的典籍。

sentences.english: There has been much dispute over The mountain big lake.
sentences.chinese: 《山海經》自古以來就是一部爭議非常大的古籍。

sentences.english: This dissertation chooses Hai Ching in Shan Hai Ching as the research targets.
sentences.chinese: 本文選取《山海經》中《海經》部分進行專題研究。

sentences.english: The original picture of 'Mountains-Seas Book' has never been seen.
sentences.chinese: 山海經古圖至今未被發現。

sentences.english: Back in BC, "Book of Mountains and Seas" in the tea oil as a cooking oil will be recorded.
sentences.chinese: 早在公元前《山海經》中便有茶油作爲食用油的記載。

definition: Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
legend/folklore/to repeat from mouth to mouth/they say that...
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
document
Zhuangzi (369-286 BC), Daoist author
Shijing, the Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems and one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1]
to write down/to record/written account
to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
to explain/to expound/to interpret/elucidation
to infer/inference/corollary/reasoned conclusion
to describe/to depict/to portray/description
to correspond/a correspondence/corresponding/homologous/matching with sth/counterpart
Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
imperial edict/heavenly book (superstition)/obscure or illegible writing/double dutch
treatise/discourse/exposition
